definition: to lower/to decrease/to reduce/to subtract/to diminish
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people
plus-minus sign (±)/plus and minus signs (+ and -)

sentences.english: The subtraction operators are also available, providing the converse of the add and increment operations.
sentences.chinese: 也可用減號運算符，它的作用與相加和遞增操作相反。

sentences.english: The minus sign means to left-justify the string.
sentences.chinese: 減號表示使字符串左對齊。

sentences.english: Don't depend on the lack of a minus sign to mean that there are no negative numbers.
sentences.chinese: 不要根據沒有減號這一條件就認爲不會有負數。

sentences.english: Well, we swept the two components and we put a minus sign.
sentences.chinese: 把兩個分量擦掉，然後放個減號進去。

sentences.english: Each of these minus signs represents a folding point.
sentences.chinese: 這些減號每一個都代表一個摺疊點。
